name: Cave Light (Reinard Baertsoen)
description:
In ‘Cave Light’ you play as a lone explorer that got stuck in a cave, luckily you’ve got some glowsticks. Find out what they can be used for.

Controls:

  • Keyboard and mouse:
    Run: A and D
    Jump: Spacebar
    Throw: LMB
  • xBox-controller:
    Run: Left joystick
    Jump: A
    Throw: X
